text.section: An individual may register with the Department an advance directive.

section.section: The registrant shall notify the Registry if the registrant has amended or revoked a registered advance directive.

A health care provider that becomes aware that a registrant has amended or revoked a registered advance directive shall, at the request of the registrant, provide the registrant with information on how to notify the Registry.

text.section: An individual is not required to submit an advance directive to the Registry.
Nothing in this Part II of this subtitle affects the validity of an advance directive that is not submitted to the Registry.
